title: Add clutch plate logo beside business name in header

requirements.summary: Generate a custom automotive-style clutch plate logo image depicting a clutch plate with a professional mechanical aesthetic that matches the warm, trustworthy color palette of the site
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is generated showing a clutch plate design
Logo style matches the professional automotive theme
Logo uses colors from the warm automotive color palette defined in the site

file_operations.description: Generate professional automotive-style clutch plate logo image with mechanical details, metallic finish, and warm automotive colors matching the site theme. This image will be referenced in the Header component as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated/clutch-logo.dim_120x120.png

requirements.summary: Update the Header component to display the generated clutch plate logo beside the business name 'Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center', positioning it to the left of the business name text
acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears in the Header component beside the business name
Logo is positioned to the left of 'Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center' text
Logo renders from frontend/public/assets/generated as a static asset
Logo size is appropriate for the header layout and scales well on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Add the clutch plate logo image to the left of the business name in the Header component. Reference the generated image at frontend/public/assets/generated/clutch-logo.dim_120x120.png as a static asset. Ensure proper sizing (appropriate for header, responsive on mobile) and positioning to the left of 'Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center' text. Maintain the existing gradient background, sticky positioning, and overall Header structure. Include alt text for accessibility
